participant_2.background:
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.
I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
I almost shot a tourist while playing with my gun.
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
i am the youngest of 3.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
I love cooking and playing video games.
Oh cool! I'm not much of a gamer but I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes, especially with a lot of different flavors.
I love pasta! I love the way you can mix and match so many different flavors.
Me too! And it's not too hard to make a delicious meal.
Oh that's a classic! I love carbonara.
Do you ever put bacon in your carbonara?
I do sometimes! But I actually like it without bacon sometimes too.
I'm not a huge fan of bacon, so I usually leave it out.
Me too! I like the flavor of bacon but it can be a little too much sometimes.
So what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go out to concerts and listen to live music.
I love live music too! I went to a local metal show for my last birthday.
Oh that sounds like a lot of fun! I love metal music too.
